data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word اللَّهُ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.

data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِي comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.

data.meanings: fire, flame, heat, war, light, shine, sparkle, irritate, vex or provoke war.
data.sentence: The word النَّارِ comes from the root ن و ر and is associated with the meanings: fire, flame, heat, war, light, shine, sparkle, irritate, vex or provoke war.

data.meanings: (Dal-Nun-Alif) To be near, come near or low, let down, be akin to.
data.sentence: The word الدُّنْيَا comes from the root د ن و and is associated with the meanings: (Dal-Nun-Alif) To be near, come near or low, let down, be akin to.

data.meanings: go backwards, retreat/recede/retire, hold back/delay/postpone/defer, last/back part of a thing .Another, other, 2nd.
data.sentence: The word الْءَاخِرَةِ comes from the root ا خ ر and is associated with the meanings: go backwards, retreat/recede/retire, hold back/delay/postpone/defer, last/back part of a thing .Another, other, 2nd.

data.meanings: he wrote it, to dictate it, prescribe/appoint/ordain, judged / passed sentence / decreed, drew/brought together, collected, conjoined / bound, he sewed it, what is written (e.g. of law), mode/manner of writing, book, bookseller, a thing in which or on which one writes, record/register/writ, revealed scripture, a writer/scribe/secretary, an army/military force, troop.
data.sentence: The word كَتَبَ comes from the root ك ت ب and is associated with the meanings: he wrote it, to dictate it, prescribe/appoint/ordain, judged / passed sentence / decreed, drew/brought together, collected, conjoined / bound, he sewed it, what is written (e.g. of law), mode/manner of writing, book, bookseller, a thing in which or on which one writes, record/register/writ, revealed scripture, a writer/scribe/secretary, an army/military force, troop.

data.meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.
data.sentence: The word عَذَابُ comes from the root ع ذ ب and is associated with the meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.

data.meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.
data.sentence: The word لَعَذَّبَهُمْ comes from the root ع ذ ب and is associated with the meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.
